name: Escaped Ghosts
description:
You are a famous magician. You are doing research. You have messed up the order and something has gone wrong. In the dungeon, ghosts have broken free. Each ghost requires its own kindly fire.

Be careful, they patrol the corridors and rooms. With every second, they become stronger. Good Luck and Fun.

Control: 

WASD  - sideways.

R - level reload.

Hope you enjoy. 

Programming: Pavel Gordienko

Sound Design: Fedor Komarov-Gordienko
